titleStmt.title: The fortresse of fayth defended both by the Scripture, and doctors / gathered by the learned German Bodonius ; and translated out of Latine into English by Edward Crane.
titleStmt.author: Bodonius, Stephanus.
Crane, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at Lonodn [sic] in Fletestreat by VVylliam Griffith,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the John Rylands University Library of Manchester.
